title: [BUG] SkiaSharp DllImport error loading library libSkiaSharp.so
body:
**Description**

After upgrading to SkiaSharp.Views.Forms 2.80.1 (from 1.60.3) we are encountering this error when loading a SkiaSharp view in Xamarin Forms for Android 10

```
[Mono] DllImport attempting to load: 'libSkiaSharp.so'.
[Mono] DllImport error loading library '/storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.myapp/files/.__override__/libSkiaSharp.so': 'dlopen failed: library "libvpsextension.so" not found'.
[Mono] DllImport error loading library '/storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.myapp/files/.__override__/libSkiaSharp.so': '(null)'.
[Mono] DllImport error loading library '/storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.myapp/files/.__override__/libSkiaSharp.so': '(null)'.
[Mono] DllImport error loading library '/system/lib64/libSkiaSharp.so': '(null)'.
[chatty] uid=10274(com.myapp) identical 1 line
[Mono] DllImport error loading library '/system/lib64/libSkiaSharp.so': '(null)'.
[Mono] DllImport error loading library 'libSkiaSharp.so': 'dlopen failed: library "libSkiaSharp.so" not found'.
[chatty] uid=10274(com.myapp) identical 2 lines
[Mono] DllImport error loading library 'libSkiaSharp.so': 'dlopen failed: library "libSkiaSharp.so" not found'.
[Mono] DllImport unable to load library 'libSkiaSharp.so'.
[Mono] DllImport attempting to load: 'libSkiaSharp.so'.
[Mono] DllImport error loading library '/storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.myapp/files/.__override__/libSkiaSharp.so': '(null)'.
[chatty] uid=10274(com.myapp) identical 1 line
[Mono] DllImport error loading library '/storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.myapp/files/.__override__/libSkiaSharp.so': '(null)'.
[Mono] DllImport error loading library '/system/lib64/libSkiaSharp.so': '(null)'.
[chatty] uid=10274(com.myapp) identical 1 line
[Mono] DllImport error loading library '/system/lib64/libSkiaSharp.so': '(null)'.
[Mono] DllImport error loading library 'libSkiaSharp.so': 'dlopen failed: library "libSkiaSharp.so" not found'.
[chatty] uid=10274(com.myapp) identical 2 lines
[Mono] DllImport error loading library 'libSkiaSharp.so': 'dlopen failed: library "libSkiaSharp.so" not found'.
[Mono] DllImport unable to load library 'libSkiaSharp.so'.
```

**Expected Behavior**

Library loads correctly

**Actual Behavior**

Error seen above

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.1 (I also tested with 2.80.0 after seeing #1341 -- 2.80.0 had the same issue)
- Last known good version:  1.60.3
- IDE:  VS Mac
- Xamarin Forms: 4.8.0.1269
- Platform Target Frameworks:
  - Android: 10 API 29
- Target Devices:   Samsung Galaxy S10, Android 10, Security Patch Level August 1 2020
  
<details>
